name: Crystal Commander
description:
Crystal Commander

You are the Commander of a city and must defend it from the oncoming monsters. Defeat monsters to survive and see how many waves you can protect your city.
Equip items to to fit your strategy and play style.

Controls  (You can change your keyboard configurations in the Options Menu)
Mouse: Can be used to select an option and move by clicking on the map.
Arrow Keys: Move
Z: Confirm
X: Cancel
1, 2,  3, 4, 5: Ally Shortcut

***** Note
During the first play through, you may encounter a bug that freezes the game due to loading resources for the first time. It seems to occur on the web browser. If it freezes, press F5 to reload the page and it shouldn't occur again.
*****
A demo of a game idea that I have been working on. Just wanted to share for others to enjoy. -pattaq

Developer Notes:
*Note: I have added an auto save during the battles so that you can continue if a error occurs.
*It may lag if your computer is running on a low power performance setting.
*There are 2 Bosses to encounter.
*You can only have 1 of each equipment. There is a bug where you can buy a second equipment if you have it currently equipped.

Software used: RPG Maker MV
